p: The total polyphenol concentration was analyzed using the previously described Folin–Ciocalteu method [ 34]. CFEE (1 mL, 100 μg/mL) was mixed with Folin–Ciocalteu reagent (1 M, 0.5 mL) for 3 min, then 3 mL of 7.5% Na 2CO 3 was added and the mixture was allowed to react for 2 h with intermittent mixing. The absorbance of the mixture was measured at 750 nm using a U-3210 spectrophotometer (Hitachi, Tokyo, Japan). A standard curve, using gallic acid (methanol solution), was prepared using the same method.
